channel.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
channel.description: I'd probably add an inventory system that lets you carry and deploy turrets, so you could set up ambushes. Either that, or get rid of the Ichys, they scare the crap out of me. :fffuuu:

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Jingles
item.description:
Please, stop the purple text. It is just annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
The gibs in SMOD were terrible anyway. They were just oversized bright red lumps that bore little resemblance to any form of anatomy.

item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Ham_Solo
item.description:
Gordon-Freeman:

That looks like a great idea, Gibs in explosion but is that a feature from a popular Half Life 2 mod: SMOD?

Yes they are.
But I turned everything but gibs and iron sights off.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Good god, triple post.

If I wanted to change something about Half-Life, it would be dynamic shadows.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: pepeforever
item.description:
-Gordon having limbs visible to himself instead of “1337 t3l3ph47y sk1llz” :freeman::freeman::freeman: and reflections of himself in the water
-Giving the player an explication of what happened in the last 20 years, it doesn’t matter to me if it is a 20 minutes cutscene, I just would like people could appreciate Half-Life’s awesome story without having to go to “The Half Life Saga Story Guide” site.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Gordon-Freeman
item.description:
Dias:

Then why did you say otherwise?

I didn’t say otherwise…

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Gordon-Freeman
item.description:
I wanna add a Headcrab throwing weapon because when you face a Human Grunt on Half Life or Combine Soldier in Half Life 2, You can distract them or (possibly) latching on them which will cause instant death. That sounds pretty awesome but it sounds like the cut weapon from Half Life 2. It kinda sounds like the Snark from Half Life 1 but sounds cool to me…

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Gordon-Freeman
item.description:
Ham Solo:

Just minor adjustments for realism

  • A body while driving and for reflections
  • Gibs in explosions, but not after just shooting or crowbaring a corpse

That looks like a great idea, Gibs in explosion but is that a feature from a popular Half Life 2 mod: SMOD?

Read full topic

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Give it some fucking stealth options. Seriously all the enemies knew where you were.

I wanted stealth kills.

You can pick up a can in HL2 and the soldiers won’t notice you.

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: DeleteThis
item.description:
Dual Magnums and a more brutal crowbar system
Grab his throat and bash his face with a crowbar
Hit him in the stomach with crowbar, drop him on ground, slam on his face
And
Wait for it
THROWING CROWBARS :awesome:

Read full topic
item.source: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?

item.title: If you could change anything about HL, what would it be?
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
You can change the max ammo of any weapon with convars. Just type ‘sk_max_’ and then the weapon name & you can set how much ammo. But really, the amount of ammo is well balanced and shouldn’t really be tampered with.

Read full topic
